meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6835.

div.div: Battle of the Decades quarterfinal game 5.

td.p: Colby Burnett, an AP world history teacher from Chicago, Illinois
Mark Dawson, a writer and editor for the Honda Campus All-Star Challenge from Chamblee, Georgia
Chuck Forrest, an attorney for the UN IFAD from Marino, Italy

tr.td: SOUTH AMERICAN WILDLIFE
IT SOUNDS LIKE A LETTER
THAT '70s SHOW
SHERLOCK HOLMES STORIES
YOU HAD ONE JOB!
FASHION "P"IECES
